amendment.description: To amend titles 10 and 38 of the United States Code, to modify the circumstances under which a person who has committed a capital offense is denied certain burial-related benefits and funeral honors.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2562 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
